/* Influence on culture, music and business */ Their is no "first" David Lee Roth era. That implies a second. The 1996 semi-reunion and the cancelled tour do not constitute new Roth "eras"!
Poster bizzarely capitalized both group names, and used very poor grammar .

/* (Dec 2005 - Present) Reunion with David Lee Roth */
Writer was editorializing, Stating rumors were untrue.Complilation CD was indeed cancelled. Status of tour undetermined. Writer opining. could not know if reports were false or not!
No such album. There was one planned but cancelled.

Replaced "short term reunion" with "semi-reunion". DLR returned to join EVH & AVH in the studio, but according to EVH, it was never a full reunion, and the band continued audition replacements for SH.
